text: Vikerlased (The Vikings) is an Estonian opera in three acts by Evald Aav. It is considered to be the first Estonian opera. The libretto is written by Voldemar Loo. The libretto depicts events related to Pillage of Sigtuna in 1187. The premiere was on 8 September 1928 in Estonia Theatre. The opera lasts 2 hours and 15 minutes. ==References== Category:1928 operas Category:Estonian- language operas Category:Operas set in the 12th century Category:Operas
title: Vikerlased
